revised_title: Proteid Substances in Latex: A Study on the Composition and Properties of Latex Proteids
tldr: The author investigates the composition and properties of proteid substances in latex, specifically in the latex of a plant called "Gegrip pnteh." They discover a curious proteid body that differs from previously described plant proteids. The body exhibits characteristics of both peptones and albumoses, suggesting a unique classification within these groups. The study contributes to the understanding of nitrogenous metabolism in plants and the identification of proteid bodies circulating in plant latex.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Physiology
